ObexProtocol * IrdaObexTransport::GetProtocol (  ObexProtocolId  level  )  [virtual]
 

Provides access to the protocol layer object of the specified level.

Parameters:
level Protocol level / layer
Returns:
Pointer to object or '0' if protocol is unsupported.
Note: All transports must support at least ObexProtocol::ObexLevel !

Implements ObexAbstractTransport.

void IrdaObexTransport::ResolveClientAddr (  const String &  client_url,
ObexProtocolId  prot_id,
ObexOperationId  job_id
)  [virtual]
 

Resolves an OBEX client address URL.

This is a factory method which evaluates the URL given in string format and creates an address information object which may contain specific information for the transport. This is accomplished by deriving a subclass from ObexClientAddr and creating an address information object from this class. Then a smartpointer of type ObexAddrPtr to this object and the job_id which was supplied with the URL must be returned by calling ReturnObexAddress().

Parameters:
client_url Client address in URL format
prot_id Protocol which will be bound to the address
job_id Reference to associate request and response

Implements ObexAbstractTransport.

void IrdaObexTransport::ResolveServerAddr (  const String &  server_url,
ObexProtocolId  prot_id,
BOOLEAN  sdb_autocreate,
ObexOperationId  job_id
)  [virtual]
 

Resolves an OBEX server address URL.

This is a factory method which evaluates the URL given in string format and creates an address information object which may contain specific information for the transport. This is accomplished by deriving a subclass from ObexServerAddr and creating an address information object from this class. Then a smartpointer of type ObexAddrPtr to this object and the job_id which was supplied with the URL must be returned by calling ReturnObexAddress().

Parameters:
server_url Server address in URL format
prot_id Protocol which will be bound to the address
sdb_autocreate Check whether address can be autoregistered
job_id Reference to associate request and response

Implements ObexAbstractTransport.
